solution_line_template: He has {more_belts_than_hats} more belts than hats and he has {num_hats} hats so he has {more_belts_than_hats}+{num_hats} = <<{more_belts_than_hats}+{num_hats}={num_belts}>>{num_belts} belts
He has twice as many shoes as belts and he has {num_belts} belts so he has {multiplier_for_shoes}*{num_belts} = <<{multiplier_for_shoes}*{num_belts}={num_shoes}>>{num_shoes} shoes
